name: MLCLayer
desc: The base class for all framework layers.

items.name: var layerID: Int
items.desc: A unique number that identifies each layer.

items.name: var label: String
items.desc: A string that helps identify this layer.

items.name: var isDebuggingEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether you choose to debug the layer when executing a graph that includes it.

items.name: var deviceType: MLCDeviceType
items.desc: A device type that indicates where the system executes the layer.

items.name: class func supportsDataType(MLCDataType, on: MLCDevice) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean that indicates whether instances of this layer accept source tensors for the data type and device that you specify.
